page.title: 09THE HEPHAISTOS SCHOOL
page.content:
THE HEPHAISTOS SCHOOL IS SITUATED IN FARLEY HILL,READING NEAR SWALLOWFIELD. THE SCHOOL DEALS WITH HANDICAPPED CHILDREN,THEY ARE TAUGHT THE SUBJECTS THAT THEY WOULD NORMALLY LEARN AT ANY OTHER SCHOOL.THERE HAVE BEEN TWO HEAD TEACHERS AT THE SCHOOL.
THE SCHOOL WAS FOUNDED IN 1958 BY MISS D. WOOLEY AND MR D. ATTERBURY.BEFORE THE HEPHAISTOS WAS A SCHOOL IT WAS A PRIVATE HOUSE AND CASTLE.TO THE ORIGINAL CASTLE THERE HAS NOW BEEN ADDED A PURPOSE BUILT DINING ROOM, A DORMITORY BLOCK,A SWIMMING POOL AND A SCHOOL BLOCK.PRIVATE HOUSES HAVE REPLACED THE STABLES AND OUTHOUSES.
